dcterms:creator: Rezarta Islamaj Dogan
Robert Leaman
Zhiyong Lu
dcterms:description: The NCBI Disease Dataset is a comprehensive publicly available dataset annotated with disease mentions, categorized into four different categories: specific disease, disease class, composite disease, and modifier.
dcterms:title: NCBI Disease Dataset

dcterms:creator: Robert Leaman
Christopher Miller
G Gonzalez
dcterms:description: The AZDC Dataset is an earlier dataset annotated with disease mentions only, without categorization into types.
dcterms:title: AZDC Dataset
